text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia nardoi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 1.6 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
Greek Exclusive Economic Zone
Portuguese Exclusive Economic Zone
Spanish Exclusive Economic Zone
the Black Sea
